taskbody.prereq: The following steps assume that you have a table in the Editor area.

choices.choice: If you are creating the first table group, click within a Placeholder column or a Domain column. Note that computed columns and dynamic columns cannot hold groups.
If you are extending existing groups with a new one, click in the column where groups are defined.

step.cmd: Right-click in the selected column and select Add Grouping .

taskbody.result: A group is added in the column. Select the group for setting its properties.
